pkgmetadata.longdescription: # polywrap-manifestPython implementation of the WRAP manifest schema at https://github.com/polywrap/wrap## Usage### Deserialize WRAP manifest```pythonfrom polywrap_manifest import deserialize_wrap_manifest, WrapManifest_0_1with open("<path to WRAP package>/wrap.info", "rb") as f: raw_manifest = f.read()manifest = deserialize_wrap_manifest(raw_manifest)assert isinstance(manifest, WrapManifest_0_1)```
